name: Glo Away Glow-in-the-Dark Washable Craft Paint
description: Unique gel paint lets you create glow in the dark projects that wash away with soap and water. Glo Away paint is safe for fabric, wood, glass, plastic and ceramics. Paint can be used to do artwork and can be added to other projects that you want to glow.Certified AP non toxicPaint is perfect for decorating kids rooms and ceilingsReactivates when exposed to lightCan be used with stencils to create unique and exciting projects
